Groundtruth:
import fitz
import PDFbf

# File-level information
filepath = "AB12CD.pdf"
doc = fitz.open(filepath)

# Annotation extractor
annoextractor = PDFbf.extractanno(doc=doc)

# Page-level and order-level information
pagenumber = 2  # Page 3 (0-based index)
rectangleorder = 1  # Second rectangle (0-based index)

# Extracting target rectangle
rectangle, rfpoint = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber, rectangleorder=rectangleorder)

# Table content
argument = dict(
    clip=rectangle,
    data=[["Beam", "Length", "Material"], ["B1", "5m", "Steel"], ["B2", "7m", "Concrete"]],
    font="Arial",
    fontsize=12
)

# Adding the table
table_adder = PDFbf.manipulate_table(
    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber,
    clip=argument.get("clip"),
    data=argument.get("data"),
    font=argument.get("font"),
    fontsize=argument.get("fontsize")
)
doc = table_adder.addtable()

# Save the updated file
updated_file = filepath[:-4] + "_updated.pdf"
doc.save(updated_file)

import PDFbf

# File-level information
filepath = "surveyData_P5K9.pdf"

    clip=rectangle_4,
    data=[
        ["Survey Point", "Elevation"],
        ["A1", "150m"],
        ["B2", "155m"]
    ]
)

    doc=doc,

    clip=argument1.get("clip"),

# Second table content on page 11, rectangle 4

    clip=rectangle_4,
    data=[
        ["Coordinate", "Description"],
        ["C3", "Benchmark"],

    ],
    # Using the same general font style:
    font="Arial",
    fontsize=11
)

    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber_11,
    clip=argument2.get("clip"),
    data=argument2.get("data"),
    font=argument2.get("font"),
    fontsize=argument2.get("fontsize")
)
doc = table_adder2.addtable()

# Save after adding the two tables on page 11, rectangle 4

Groundtruth:
import fitz
import PDFbf

# File-level information
filepath = "UV12WX.pdf"
doc = fitz.open(filepath)

# Annotation extractor
annoextractor = PDFbf.extractanno(doc=doc)

# Page-level and order-level information for Rectangle 6 on Page 5
pagenumber = 4  # Page 5 (0-based index)
rectangleorder = 5  # Sixth rectangle (0-based index)

# Extracting target rectangle
rectangle, rfpoint = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber, rectangleorder=rectangleorder)

# Table content
argument = dict(
    clip=rectangle,
    data=[
        ["Pipe", "Diameter", "Material"],
        ["P1", "100mm", "PVC"],
        ["P2", "150mm", "HDPE"]
    ],
    arrange=[[30, 25, 25], None],  # Adjusting row heights
    font="Times New Roman",  # Specifying a standard font
    fontsize=11  # Font size
)

# Adding the table
table_adder = PDFbf.manipulate_table(
    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber,
    clip=argument.get("clip"),
    data=argument.get("data"),
    arrange=argument.get("arrange"),
    font=argument.get("font"),
    fontsize=argument.get("fontsize")
)
doc = table_adder.addtable()

# Save the updated file
updated_file = filepath[:-4] + "_updated.pdf"
doc.save(updated_file)
